title: 2 new game-mode ideas
body:
so I'm a fairly new player, i joined around the start of season 4. because i was pretty bad at the game (still am) when i first started playing, i didn't really understand the really fun builds that were available at the time and i didn't really goof around with things like full ap Sion or Soraka mid. looking back at old YouTube videos of the game makes me really wish that there was a game-mode where we could play as champions as they were in say season 2 or 3. like we could play on the same summoners rift but have the old characters, items and summoners spells (RIP revive). 

my second idea is kind of a mashup between game-modes. imagine one for all mirror mode U.R.F, maybe even on howling abyss instead of summoner rift. I'm just imagining how hilarious it would be to have 5 Jinxs or Ezreals all ulting at the same time every 15 seconds or the intensity of 5 v 5 Nidalee U.R.F in one lane

thank you for reading

replies.body: 5v5 nidalee URF. Make it more intense. Every Nid has 2000 AP and no MR. Dodgeball Mode happens.
Or just give Nid's Q Veigar's Q-passive. The escalation is real! Well... might need to add a lot more minions to stack that.
no no no, the idea is that you can walk into the lane at minute 1 and get one-shot.

But... but... escalation...

If you're gonna be that way about it, why not just give everyone 1 health?
because then you'd get auto'd and one-shot. no counterplay aside from stay away. However, it's also really scary having the "I have 1300 hp and then just got deleted instantly" situation.

Q-range >>> auto-range. Besides, I dunno man, I like to live life on the edge. Minionssassination op. I say we give minions 1 hp too btw. Just give EVERYTHING 1 hp. The game would be all about creating formations to prevent anyone from ninja-flashing close into to a tower to one-shot it.

Of course, most of those games might only last 5 minutes.
